author: remm
msg: - Commit a new revision of the filesystem descriptors store. It's about 15%
done, but it could be a starting point for anyone interested in working on

author: juergen
msg: minor change: if a store is divided into several chield stores (e.g. node, content, lock, ...)
the parameters can now be specified at the father store and are inherited to the child stores.
The child stores may overwrite the fathers setting in their scope.
In this case the conetent store is able to read the parameter "taminoDataStore".

msg: - Found another spot where the descriptor was stored before the content.
